org.jgentleframework.core.provider
Interface Domain

All Superinterfaces:
java.beans.beancontext.BeanContextServiceProvider
public interface Domain
extends java.beans.beancontext.BeanContextServiceProvider

Domain is a BeanContextServiceProvider. It contains all ServiceClass instance in JGentle system. It provides some necessary features in order to manage ServiceClass includes instantiate ServiceClass instane, register or checking status of Domain. Moreover, it also offers some programmatic introspection tools in order to support tool development.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:

getRegisteredServiceList

java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Class<? extends ServiceClass>,ObjectBeanService> getRegisteredServiceList()
Returns the HashMap containing all ObjectBeanServices corresponding to object classes of registered ServiceClass. Key of returned HashMap is object class type of ServiceClass, and its value is corresponding ObjectBeanService instance.

Parameters:
serviceClass - object class type of ServiceClass need to be registered.

Returns:

registerService

ObjectBeanService registerService(java.lang.Class<? extends ServiceClass> serviceClass,
                                  java.beans.beancontext.BeanContextServices bcs,
                                  java.lang.Class<?>[] argsType,
                                  java.lang.Object[] args)
Registers an ServiceClass to this Domain

Parameters:
serviceClass - the object class type of ServiceClass need to be registerd
bcs -
argsType - the object class types of arguments of specified constructor are used to instantiate instance corresponding to ServiceClass.
args - the arguments of specified constructor of object class of ServiceClass are used to instantiate instance corresponding to ServiceClass.
Returns:
returns the previous ObjectBeanService according to registerd ServiceClass if it was registered, if not, returns null.
